scripts.clean-build-test: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn test
scripts.browserify: mkdir -p browserify-tests && browserify build/test/*.test.js build/test/browser-run.js > browserify-tests/bundle.js
scripts.test-in-browser: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn browserify && yarn browser-run
scripts.depchart-notypes: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` `find src | grep '/types/'` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-notypes --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-most: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-most --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart-most-loose: depchart `find src | grep .ts` --exclude src/decls.d.ts src/index.ts src/index.browser.ts `find src | grep '/test/'` `find src | grep '/util/'` --loose --rankdir LR -o depchart/depchart-most-loose --node_modules omit
scripts.depchart: yarn depchart-notypes && yarn depchart-most && yarn depchart-most-loose
